author: juergen
msg: removed the stack trace printlns. the cause is printed a a warning.

author: juergen
msg: added an entry for ServiceAccessException, a more speaking message is now produced as a warning.

author: juergen
msg: make the rollback more robust. in case of multiple stores had to be rolled back and the first store threw an exception the later stores were not rolled back, thus the transaction was still pending. (enlist error -9)

author: juergen
msg: in case of an error, force a rollback (throw an exception).

author: remm
msg: - Add very preliminary version of the index / search API.
